newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela's CANTV opens internet service.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela's CANTV opens internet service.

text.p: Venezuelan telephone company CANTV, due to be fully privatised in November under a global share offering, is to open a local internet gateway service, CANTV said.
Internet access and web site development will be offered through company affiliate CANTV Servicios C.A., which already offers voice mail, CANTV Servicios President Bernardo Beyer told reporters.
Some 10-15,000 Venezuelans now use the internet and this is forecast to grow to between 30-50,000 by the end of 1997 according to conservative estimates, Beyer said.
